app.name: VentusVault
app.description: VentusVault is a world-class trading super-app that combines gift card trading, cryptocurrency exchange, instant Naira payouts, bill payments, P2P trading, AI-powered trading suggestions, and gamified rewards into one seamless platform.

problem_statement.market_gap: Nigerian traders face fragmented trading experiences across multiple platforms with slow payouts, poor rates, limited crypto support, and zero engagement incentives.

weaknesses: Basic UI with no real-time rate updates
KSBTECH.ventusvault_advantage: Instant Naira payouts under 60 seconds, live rate ticker, glass card rewards system

weaknesses: Gift card only - no crypto trading
CardTonic.ventusvault_advantage: All-in-one super-app with gift cards + crypto + bills + P2P + rewards in single wallet

problem_statement.solution: VentusVault consolidates all trading needs into one premium platform with instant payouts, live rates, AI suggestions, and gamified rewards that keep traders engaged and earning.

user_types.label: Basic Trader
user_types.description: New users getting started with gift card and crypto trading
features: 1 free spin per day on reward wheel

user_types.label: VIP Trader
user_types.description: Active traders with higher volume and premium perks
features: Full crypto suite (BTC, ETH, USDT, SOL)
3 free spins per day on reward wheel

user_types.label: Investor
features: Full crypto suite with margin indicators
5 free spins per day + exclusive rewards
Premium referral program (8% bonus + tier bonuses)

core.name: Gift Card Trading
core.description: Buy and sell gift cards (iTunes, Amazon, Steam, Google Play, etc.) with instant rate calculation and Naira payout
user_stories: As a trader, I want to select a gift card brand and enter the amount so I can see the Naira value instantly
As a trader, I want to upload my gift card image/code so the system can verify and process my trade
As a trader, I want to track my gift card trade status in real-time

core.name: Crypto Trading
core.description: Trade BTC, ETH, USDT, and SOL with live market rates and instant conversion to Naira
user_stories: As a trader, I want to see live crypto prices (BTC, ETH, USDT, SOL) with price change indicators
As a trader, I want to buy or sell crypto and see the Naira equivalent before confirming
As an investor, I want to view my crypto portfolio with profit/loss tracking

core.name: Instant Naira Payouts
core.description: Lightning-fast Naira payouts to any Nigerian bank account
user_stories: As a trader, I want to withdraw my Naira balance to my bank account instantly
As a trader, I want to save multiple bank accounts for quick payouts
As a trader, I want to see my payout history with timestamps

core.name: Secure Wallet
core.description: Multi-currency wallet with Naira balance, transaction history, and security features
user_stories: As a user, I want to see my wallet balance prominently on the home screen
As a user, I want to view all my transactions with filters and search
As a user, I want my wallet protected with PIN/biometric authentication

core.name: Live Rates
core.description: Real-time rate display for gift cards and crypto assets
user_stories: As a trader, I want to see live crypto prices updating in real-time on my dashboard
As a trader, I want to see current gift card rates before initiating a trade
As a trader, I want to receive rate alerts when prices hit my target

core.name: Bills & Airtime
core.description: Pay utility bills (electricity, cable TV, internet) and purchase airtime/data from wallet balance
user_stories: As a user, I want to buy airtime for any Nigerian network from my wallet
As a user, I want to pay my electricity, cable, and internet bills in-app
As a user, I want to save frequent bill payment details for quick reuse

core.name: P2P Trading
core.description: Peer-to-peer trading marketplace with escrow protection
user_stories: As a VIP trader, I want to create buy/sell offers for other traders
As a trader, I want to browse P2P offers and trade directly with other users
As a trader, I want escrow protection so my funds are safe during P2P trades

core.name: AI Trading Suggestions
core.description: AI-powered recommendations for optimal trading times, best rates, and portfolio optimization
user_stories: As a VIP trader, I want AI suggestions on the best time to sell my gift cards
As an investor, I want AI-powered portfolio recommendations based on market trends
As a trader, I want personalized alerts when trading conditions are favorable

core.name: Glass Card Rewards
core.description: Gamified reward system with spinning glass cards that reveal bonuses, cashback, and trading credits
user_stories: As a user, I want to spin a reward wheel daily to win bonuses and cashback
As a user, I want to see my collected rewards and their values
As a VIP trader, I want exclusive reward tiers with higher value prizes

core.name: Referral System
core.description: Multi-tier referral program with unique codes, invite tracking, and bonus rewards
user_stories: As a user, I want a unique referral code I can share with friends
As a user, I want to track how many people signed up with my code
As a user, I want to earn bonus rewards when my referrals complete trades

tech_stack.design: Custom dark theme with gold accents, glass card UI effects
